00001 #ifndef _ESM_FACT_H
00002 #define _ESM_FACT_H
00003 
00004 #include "esm_reader.hpp"
00005 
00006 namespace ESM {
00007 
00008 /*
00009  * Faction definitions
00010  */
00011 
00012 // Requirements for each rank
00013 struct RankData
00014 {
00015   int attribute1, attribute2; // Attribute level
00016 
00017   int skill1, skill2;     // Skill level (faction skills given in
00018                           // skillID below.) You need one skill at
00019                           // level 'skill1' and two skills at level
00020                           // 'skill2' to advance to this rank.
00021 
00022   int factReaction;       // Reaction from faction members
00023 };
00024 
00025 struct Faction
00026 {
00027   std::string id, name;
00028 
00029   struct FADTstruct
00030   {
00031     // Which attributes we like
00032     int attribute1, attribute2;
00033 
00034     RankData rankData[10];
00035 
00036     int skillID[6]; // IDs of skills this faction require
00037     int unknown;    // Always -1?
00038     int isHidden;   // 1 - hidden from player
00039   }; // 240 bytes
00040 
00041   FADTstruct data;
00042 
00043   struct Reaction
00044   {
00045     std::string faction;
00046     int reaction;
00047   };
00048 
00049   std::vector<Reaction> reactions;
00050 
00051   // Name of faction ranks (may be empty for NPC factions)
00052   std::string ranks[10];
00053 
00054   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00055   {
00056     name = esm.getHNString("FNAM");
00057 
00058     // Read rank names. These are optional.
00059     int i = 0;
00060     while(esm.isNextSub("RNAM") && i<10) ranks[i++] = esm.getHString();
00061 
00062     // Main data struct
00063     esm.getHNT(data, "FADT", 240);
00064 
00065     if(data.isHidden > 1) esm.fail("Unknown flag!");
00066 
00067     // Read faction response values
00068     while(esm.hasMoreSubs())
00069       {
00070         Reaction r;
00071         r.faction = esm.getHNString("ANAM");
00072         esm.getHNT(r.reaction, "INTV");
00073         reactions.push_back(r);
00074       }
00075   }
00076 };
00077 }
00078 #endif
